form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: TRANSLATION OF A 'POLICE RECORD', Form JJG-6

full_text: Screened by NARA. 6/6/2023 USI & NS TRANSLATION OF A POLICE RECOR" (Form JJG-6) CHICAGO, ILL (print or type) 1. THE POLICE DEPARTMENT OF: NATIONAL OFFICE OF INVESTIGATION, CHIEF IN CHARGE HEREBY CERTIFIES TEGUCIGALPA, HONDURAS C. A. 2. Certifies that: Mr./Mrs./Miss/Ms. AURELIO PENA - RODRIGUEZ (first name ) (middle) (last) 3. LIVED IN TEGUCIGALPA HONDURAS (city or town) (state or province) (country) FROM TO 5-20-1987 (month-day-year) month-day-year is. AND THAT, IN ACCORDANCE WITH OUR RECORDS, XXXX has not committed any crime. has committed the following crimes: (state them briefly with sentences,etc. ) 5. RECORD issued: by HECTOR RODRIGUEZ PAVON (full name of Officer) CHIEF, IDENTIFICATION DIVISION-NATIONAL OFFICE OF on MAY / 20 /1987 INVESTIGATION (month) (day) (year) in TEGUCIGALPA HONDURAS (city or town, (state or province) (country) CERTIFICATION OF TRANSLATOR'S COMPETENCE I, (*) AIDA J. KOCH , hereby certify that the above is an accurate translation of the original "Police Record" in (**) SPANISH and that I am competent in both English and ( (**) SPANISH to render such translation. Date MARCH / 23 / 1988 K ASSOC. CATHOLIC CHARITIES (signal of translator Agency RESETTLEMENT/IMMIGRATION 8019 EIG STREET (address) y (504) 861-9859 Phone NEW ORLEANS, LA 70125 (city) (state) (sip) (*) Printed or typed, name of the translator in full. (**)Language of the original certificate -- Spanish, French, Chinese, German, Italian,etc. The original document, and copy of it if you wish original returned, should be attached to this summary translation form and certification. Title 8 of the CFR, Part 292.1 (a) (3) forbids private individuals to charge any fees for filling out this form. DOJ-1980-09
